nodes.bodyText:
Would it be possible to incorporate the above change to the existing method?
There are other places that uses the same getExpression method, and the issue may also be there for those as well.
This is very specific case, we can not use the existing method since getExpression is used in other places. If we r to change QUALIFIED_NAME_REFERENCE case in getExpression It will affect others
Yeah thats true. But we can change the way we construct the MAPPING_BP_OR_MAPPING_CONSTRUCTOR content, inside getExpression..
